Summary: Round Circle of Flashing Lightschanging lights
trends: There have been no other sightings in BrownwoodZephyr
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were in Brown County Texas on New Years eve 2001 when we noticed somethingthat looked like an airplane low on the horizon in the Southeast sky. Wenoticed it had what looked like one bright white light, it looked like it wouldflash a red light much like an airplane. When we looked at it through atelescope it looked completely different It was round in shape with lightsspaced around the bottom. Between each light there was what looked like chaserlights. Each light around the outter circle connected to the light opposite itwith what looked like chaser lights. These light would change shapes anddirection of flashing making the lights look like diamond shapes, plaid shapesand cone shapes. We watched it for several hours and noticed it moved veryslowly upward and toward the South. By 400am it was back in the lowerSoutheastern sky where it started.Where there any other sightings on New Years Eve
